updates.title: VAICOM Community Edition for DCS World
updates.releasenotes: Updates Vaicom manual, Fix Marianas WWII airfield names, Changes for F4U-1D move to Single PTT, New radio.lua swap files, Deep debug changes, Adds Marianas WWII terrain to ATC recipients database, Adds F4U-1D to supported modules, Changes to F-22A Mod radios to support latest version, Adds OH-6A Cayuse Mod to supported modules, Fix erroneous SecurityControl error in DCS log,New Vaicom Theme for DCS (try in differnet resolutions if Poss)
